13  package net.sf.oval.expression;
14  
15  import java.util.Map;
16  import java.util.Map.Entry;
17  
18  import net.sf.oval.exception.ExpressionEvaluationException;
19  import net.sf.oval.internal.Log;
20  import net.sf.oval.internal.util.ObjectCache;
21  
22  import org.mozilla.javascript.Context;
23  import org.mozilla.javascript.ContextFactory;
24  import org.mozilla.javascript.EvaluatorException;
25  import org.mozilla.javascript.Script;
26  import org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable;
27  
28  /**
29   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
30   *
31   */
32  public class ExpressionLanguageJavaScriptImpl implements ExpressionLanguage
33  {
34  	private static final Log LOG = Log.getLog(ExpressionLanguageJavaScriptImpl.class);
35  
36  	private final Scriptable parentScope;
37  
38  	private final ObjectCache<String, Script> scriptCache = new ObjectCache<String, Script>();
39  
40  	/**
41  	 * Default constructor.
42  	 */
43  	public ExpressionLanguageJavaScriptImpl()
44  	{
45  		final Context ctx = ContextFactory.getGlobal().enterContext();
46  		try
47  		{
48  			parentScope = ctx.initStandardObjects();
49  		}
50  		finally
51  		{
52  			Context.exit();
53  		}
54  	}
55  
56  	/**
57  	 * {@inheritDoc}
58  	 */
59  	public Object evaluate(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values) throws ExpressionEvaluationException
60  	{
61  		final Context ctx = ContextFactory.getGlobal().enterContext();
62  		try
63  		{
64  			Script script = scriptCache.get(expression);
65  			if (script == null)
66  			{
67  				ctx.setOptimizationLevel(9);
68  				script = ctx.compileString(expression, "<cmd>", 1, null);
69  				scriptCache.put(expression, script);
70  			}
71  
72  			final Scriptable scope = ctx.newObject(parentScope);
73  			scope.setPrototype(parentScope);
74  			scope.setParentScope(null);
75  
76  			for (final Entry<String, ? > entry : values.entrySet())
77  			{
78  				scope.put(entry.getKey(), scope, Context.javaToJS(entry.getValue(), scope));
79  			}
80  
81  			LOG.debug("Evaluating JavaScript expression: {1}", expression);
82  			return script.exec(ctx, scope);
83  		}
84  		catch (final EvaluatorException ex)
85  		{
86  			throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("Evaluating script with Rhino failed.", ex);
87  		}
88  		finally
89  		{
90  			Context.exit();
91  		}
92  	}
93  
94  	/**
95  	 * {@inheritDoc}
96  	 */
97  	public boolean evaluateAsBoolean(final String expression, final Map<String, ? > values)
98  			throws ExpressionEvaluationException
99  	{
100 		final Object result = evaluate(expression, values);
101 		if (!(result instanceof Boolean))
102 			throw new ExpressionEvaluationException("The script must return a boolean value.");
103 		return (Boolean) result;
104 	}
105 }
